title: Acupuncture — Ashburn Natural Wellness
cleaned_text: Acupuncture Acupuncture is a form of complementary and alternative medicine performed by licensed acupuncturists. Thin needles are used to stimulate the Qi ("chi") at specific points on the body to promote healing, balance, and function in the system. It can be used to help with acute and chronic pain, headache and migraines, insomnia, stress, menstrual cramps, digestive issues, and more.
